website_summaries.verdict: Based on the number of positive feedback it received, runners have enjoyed wearing the Under Armour HOVR Sonic 2. The shoe’s unique features while still being affordable was beneficial for a lot of buyers as well. Although it seems this model still has improvements to do with regard to fit and sizing, the majority of the users have expressed their satisfaction with their purchase of the Under Armour HOVR Sonic 2.
pros: Various users were delighted with the connectivity feature of the Under Armour HOVR Sonic 2
Some were pleased with its user-friendly interface
A runner said the shoe was comfortable right out of the box
Others agreed by saying it did not require a break-in period
A lot of wearers were happy with the design of the shoe
The upper of the HOVR Sonic 2 provided good airflow and was significantly breathable, according to a user
The Under Armour HOVR Sonic 2 gave good value for money, many purchasers stated
The cushioning of the HOVR made it feel like running on air, a customer reported
cons: One reviewer wrote that the sizing was not accurate for the HOVR Sonic 2
A few buyers were disappointed that the shoe had limited width options
The shoe had a tighter fit compared to the previous version, some wearers claimed
It was slightly heavier than other Under Armour shoes, said a runner

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but with a caveat
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes to try out the HOVR line. Because I wear custom orthotics, I picked the Sonic b/c they are the only ones in the HOVR line (per Under Armour customer service) with removable insoles. Unfortunately, the shoe's heel design is such that the orthotics don't fit properly and they place my heel too high at the back of the shoe. I have a set of low "running" orthotics and they are fine but customs won't work. Short version, if you can wear these as is, they're fine but if you are looking for something that you can use your orthotics, they are a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Psi 5

customer_reviews.title: Best everyday gym and running shoe on the market right now
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shoe that could be an everyday gym/running shoe. I did a lot of digging and found training shoes that were great for lifting. I found a lot of good running shoes. I have always loved UA and these might be the best pair I have owned. I have owned a few different pairs of bandits, sling rides, and Gemini’s and these might be the best ones yet. I lift 4 times a week and running 3-5 miles a day. These shoes are PERFECT for what I do. They are no frills, super light, comfortable, everyday shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jamesbinga

customer_reviews.title: Eyelets broke within 6 week
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fit and feel. Great to run and walk in. Top eyelets tore within the first 6 weeks -- after the return date. Looked for a place to ask the question about return or replacement, but no options to do so are readily apparent, so I thought I'd post a mostly negative review in hopes someone from Amazon will read my plea for help and respond. Next step will be to contact Under Armor directly and see how well they back their product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Love the colour, this is my 2ndbpair of this pair of Sonic 2's and they are undoubtedly the most comfortable shoes I have ever put on. They are comfortable from the minute you put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and tech
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes far. I love that these bluetooth shoes pair with my galctive active 2 underarmour edition watch and mapmyrun. I debated on buying a garmin watch and went with the underarmour shoes to pair accordingly. They are lightweight and perfect for a distance runner. The only thing I dont like is the heel is slightly uncomfortable and tight. I would recommend wearing socks that cover your whole ankle. I read plenty of reviews on multiple underarmour shoes and they were all correct on the size. They run small. On every other shoe I own, I wear 9.5, but I ordered 10s and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Zeddicus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent footwear, timely arrival, happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for running and work wear. I'm a women's 8.5 and I bought these in a men's 7. They fit just right. I will say, the women's version of this shoe in white and gold is a tiny bit more cushiony for some reason but I wanted them in black for work. The women's HOVR are just a tad more comfy for longer runs but overall I'm very happy with this shoe. I've gotten a lot of compliments on how they look. The bluetooth feature is really awesome. Had no problem syncing them to my phone and the MapMyRun app. It tracks workouts and gives you training tips that help you with your run. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding shoe, especially for someone who has issues finding a comfortable fitting shoe. Lightweight on feet but sturdy enough for daily wear. This is 2nd pair I’ve purchased for my son. As long as they have his size, will probably be ordering, yet another pair. Great price, as well
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Nice running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get used to this pair, they are a bit heavier then my last UA running shoes. I wouldn’t say it feels like running in a cloud by any means, but they have a good amount of cushion and spring back. I do like the color as well and they fit just as well as my other UA shoes did in the same size so that made me really happy. Have not used the app since I track with my Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I guess I shouldn't have expected them to fit, cause I need wide and UA only sells one shoe that is available in wide width. But if I were an over paid pro athlete, I could get them made, but I'm not so I just get to send them back and get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: lineman52

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, looks, and durability
customer_reviews.text: I only purchase UA running shoes because, #1-they fit my feet the best of any manufacturer, they are well made, comfortable, and durable. #2- they are good looking. #3- I won’t wear Nike because of their political agenda and, when I did try them a few years ago, they were very uncomfortable. I highly recommend UA shoes. Personally, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I am an army reservist and I’ve been in a long time. I’ve never really invested in shoes until one of my young Sergeants suggested I try these. We already track our workouts through MapMyRun so I wanted to see how they did. I could not be more pleased. They are extremely comfortable and sync with my app easily. It gives me great insight into my run pace, stride, tempo and much more. The styling allows me to still look cool In front of the younger soldiers as well. I would highly recommend these to anyone looking to improve their run.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Landreth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Asics for years and decided to give these a try. I'm so happy I did. Very comfortable, fit perfectly, and are the best sneakers I've ever worn. Add the ability to track your walks and runs through bluetooth and the Under Armour app, and you have a perfect way to train.
customer_reviews.author: Victor A. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: its a running sneaker, nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I've been a runner for 10 plus years now and have had many different running sneakers. I like to hope from one shoes to another, always searching for the perfect pair. This is not the one either. The sneaker is fine and kinda cool that is connect to you phone. I think these are fine for people who are starting out to run. Not a big fan of the hard shell on the back of your ankle.
customer_reviews.author: mikhail kneller

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and very comfortable shoe. If it had a little more cushioning it would get an A plus from me. I still give it an A though. Better than what I expected. Good job under armour
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe. The hovr cushioning takes some time to break in but is very responsive. They do run a bit small and narrow but not uncomfortably so. They do come with mapmyrun and are connected.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Running Shoe! Under Armor really out did itself with this running shoe. The build in Tracking system and App, make it extremely easy to track my progress as I get back in running shape....highly recommend for anyone that wants to take up running!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Ive never had Under Armour shoes before so I didn't know what to expect. They are great! Perfect In fact! I do deliveries all night long and these shoes are lightweight and very comfortable. I would recommend these to anyone! They are sized just like most brands so no guessing on what size you need. Thanks for eveything
customer_reviews.author: Janet VanMeter

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I try to get a new pair of shoes every 3 months cause all I do is walk walk walk lol these are extremely comfortable and help with my arch pain.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light weight shoes that have some additional feature I was not aware of (some blue tooth connectivity I haven't played around with or looked into yet). The one complaint is the gray color I was expecting for the shoes have a very blueish tint to it.

customer_reviews.title: Very good every day running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable running pair of shoe. My feet didn’t hurt when I run in them. Fit perfectly and I did not size up. The quality of the shoe is excellent. Very light weight but durable and well made. I like the color I chose. It looks really good on me.

customer_reviews.title: Going to buy again when hit 500 miles
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little smaller than I thought but still a good fit. They are light weight and breath well when running. The setup was easy for the Bluetooth feature. From what I can tell they track stride and cadence well.
customer_reviews.author: ZAYDE KELTON

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: My fastest mile ever is around 7:30. With these bad boys I took that to.... infinity because I don't run any more. They are comfortable to walk in though.
customer_reviews.author: Shazz

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable great feature with the GPS Tracker for when you're running and they were fast shipping

customer_reviews.title: The best running shoes I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: These and the phantom se are the best and most comfortable shoes I have ever had

customer_reviews.title: Great runners.
customer_reviews.text: Great feel. The sole and upper is more durable than the React Flyknits from the swoosh brand, but less padded. Still very comfortable. Fit fairly true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe, fit the way I thought it would!!!! Love the feel, like it so much I got a second pair!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Runner
customer_reviews.text: You can follow your tracks via Bluetooth connection. It is easy to see how long you have walked/run with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but not worth the price. The shoe started out very comfortable but for almost $100 it just didn't last. Within 6 months I would only wear them around my office not to exercise in.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gym shoe!
customer_reviews.text: It’s all in the tittle, awesome gym shoe! Great fit, very comfortable, excellent breathability. I have a very narrow heel, which usually slips out the back of my gym shoes. The high back contour holds my heel in perfectly. Also the the Bluetooth connect ability used in conjunction with “Map my Run” is a very cool feature.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes with a great app
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps with my training. Shoes feel like they are barely there

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, great fit. Helps keep me running with correct stride. I ordered a half size to big but it is still comfortable with thicker socks. Synced up with my app right away.
customer_reviews.author: Mm

customer_reviews.title: Best! Incrediblly surprised.  Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try in a pair and went on amazon and bought the upgraded hovr after first didn’t seem to fit. The second pair did! These shoes are sooo great! Best I’ve ever run in !!

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different types of sneaker this is my third pair of the hover and by far the most comfortable sneaker I have ever worn too bad they quit making it, sad day

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel great when running. My feet stay cool and the shoes stay in place. I don't use the Bluetooth feature at all so I can't give any feedback on that. I may come back to update on long term durability, but so far after two months I think the tread wear is pretty good.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best gym shoes on the market. Don’t believe the negative reviews. I’m a 10.5, they are true to size. Could care less about the Bluetooth connectivity, but cool option for runners.

customer_reviews.title: 좋아요!!
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice shoes!! My son like it very much!!

customer_reviews.title: I wish these weren't going away.
customer_reviews.text: I first bought these shoes to connect with MapMyRun. They turned out to be great running shoes. They are comfortable and supportive even for long runs.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful white shoes
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful comfortable white shoes, that I use for casualwear instead of the gym

customer_reviews.text: I love the Hovr I have four paid unfortunately when this one arrived there was dirt on the midsole some of the red on the outsole was chipping very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: These are not really a true red
customer_reviews.text: They are not really red. Once I got them outside they turned almost pink. Not very happy about it but I’m stuck with it now because I did not wear them until after the deadline had passed to return them. Seven days is not enough.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Good for everyday use or working out.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes busted
customer_reviews.text: Seam on the outside of the left show came apart, elastic material inside the heel and ankle came up. Shoes are super comfortable but I am beyond annoyed after only have these 3 months, barely using them, and paying $90...

customer_reviews.title: Great Exercise Shoe
customer_reviews.text: It is like you are walking on air. Great running shoe. Watch sand getting in the mesh. They look cool.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD SHOE
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, they were mostly positive and I agree. This shoe is excellent. Fits as expected. light and connects easily. very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Carrie J. Foss

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Was not as comfortable as I was expecting. Looks good though. Very breathable. Good quality. That's all I got.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have several pair of UA Hovr shoes for various activities and can say they are the most comfortable athletic shoe I’ve ever owned

customer_reviews.title: To whom it concerns
customer_reviews.text: Love them wear them all the time very happy with them since I bought them 😊

customer_reviews.title: One of the lightest and durable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes for running. Also, easy to connect to smart phone.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but fits small
customer_reviews.text: Fits a bit small, 1/2 size. Once sized correctly, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: V. Jobe

customer_reviews.title: Never go back to Nike again
customer_reviews.text: Wow I never go back to Nike shoes again. Great and very comfortable shoe. Only negative about not enough of colors To choose on.
customer_reviews.author: tuan

customer_reviews.title: order halfsize up!
customer_reviews.text: read the reviews, ordered the half size like everyone had said. Shoes fit great 1/2size up! Run 15 miles a week with plantar fasciitis, these shoes are doing well so far. Over a month's worth of running in them.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome over all design.
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these shoes, he says they are very comfortable and make him “go fast”. 🤣 They seem to be well made and are a great over all design.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Downs

customer_reviews.title: HOVR technology is excellent
customer_reviews.text: The new hovr sole is excellent and the plastic heel cup gives good hold and support. This is the second pair of this type I’ve purchased after spending years running in the adidas cloud boost, and I think I may never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Sessions

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe...Little pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Everyday wear. Under Armor makes very comfortable shoes. Could have bought different color for $45.00 dollars at UA Outlet?

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for everyday including running
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday shoe very comfortable! Also very nice fit as a running shoe as well!

customer_reviews.title: They run small
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looked great but I had to exchange them for a bigger pair I hope I asked for a large enough pair this time.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Awesome!

customer_reviews.text: The shoes felt great as soon as I put them on.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like this sneaker so much, they are so comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes in track and they are very comfortable and fit well also the Bluetooth works great

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and excellent running shoe for neutral foot
customer_reviews.text: Great price for advanced features within shoes along with great feel.

customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable was true to size. Did not need time to break in. Would buy again, helps with my knee after having surgery.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with the shoes design
customer_reviews.text: So fat and short shape, which looks like the women shoes

customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable running shoes I own. Throughly inpressed.

customer_reviews.text: As far as comfort goes, it is above and by far the most comfortable shoe I have ever owned.

customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and great for running! Breathable mesh is perfect for keeping feet cool.

customer_reviews.title: Talking shoes?
customer_reviews.text: A surprise to find that my shoes would send messages to my phone and give verble status messages to me every mile. Shoes good but run almost one size too small.
customer_reviews.author: PJ-Jim

product_meta.title: Under Armour Ua HOVR Sonic 2, Men's Man Shoes
product_meta.description: Almost as light as a shoe for the fast short, but with greater cushioning and maximum fluidity during the transition, the Under Armour HOVR Sonic running shoe was an instant hit among cross-country skiers who favour distance, but want more flexibility. As soon as the foot touches the ground, you will immediately understand why the Under Armour HOVR cushioning gives the feeling of weightlessness: it will seem that you have not even touched the ground. NEUTRAL: for those looking for the right balance between flexibility, cushioning and versatility DIGITAL CONNECTION: Under Armour's Record Sensor technology monitors and stores practically every data related to the race so you know exactly what you need to do to improve Under Armour HOVR technology provides a "weightlessness" feeling, favouring the return of energy and reducing the force of the impact of each step The Energy Web compression network contains the Under Armour HOVR foam that returns all the energy of your steps Micro thread upper with tone-on-tone wave pattern for a snug, breathable fit that guarantees lightness combined with directional strength and unparalleled comfort to cover long distances The ventilated panel in the central part of the foot increases breathability The particular structure of the tongue is fixed to the insole by means of flexible support tabs to maintain an enveloping fit over the whole foot External TPU counter for greater support and structure The removable Orthoclase antimicrobial midsole is modelled on the shape of the foot to ensure personalized comfort and cushioning The rubber blown under the forefoot is light but at the same time incredibly reactive The highly abrasion-resistant rubber positioned under the heel helps absorb the contact with the ground Differential: 8 mm
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: for those looking for the right balance between flexibility, cushioning and versatility
DIGITAL CONNECTION: Under Armour's Record Sensor technology monitors and stores every data related to the race
Under Armour HOVR technology offers a "gravity-free" feeling that promotes energy return and reduces the impact
The Energy Web compression network contains the Under Armour HOVR foam that returns all the energy of your steps
Micro thread upper with tone-on-tone wave pattern for a snug, breathable fit that guarantees lightness
